title: DoorDash App Not Working: Quick Fixes for Android & iPhone

steps.title: Check your connection.
steps.content: Check your connection. For best experience, connect to a stable Wi-Fi network when using the DoorDash app. You can use your cellular data, but you may be slower depending on your signal. Make sure Airplane Mode is disabled. This will turn off both your cellular and Wi-Fi connections.

steps.title: Restart your Android.
steps.content: Restart your Android. This can usually fix minor software bugs. To restart your device, hold down the Power button, and select Power off from the menu. Wait 30 seconds, and then hold the Power button to turn your device on again. Alternatively, swipe down from top to access Quick Settings and tap the power button at bottom-right or top-right corner, then tap Power off from the menu.

steps.title: Check for app updates.
steps.content: Check for app updates. If you don't have automatic updates enabled, you'll need to do so manually. Do the following: Open the Google Play Store . Tap your profile icon. Tap Manage apps & device . Tap See details . Tap Update next to DoorDash or DoorDash - Dasher .

steps.title: Log out and log in again.
steps.content: Log out and log in again. Make sure you know your account information before doing so. Tap your profile icon in the bottom-right corner. Tap Manage Account , and then Log out . Wait a few seconds, and then enter your login information again.

steps.title: Disable in-app navigation (Dashers).
steps.content: Disable in-app navigation (Dashers). If you're a dasher, there may be issues with DoorDash's navigation. You can select a different navigation app to use with DoorDash. Make sure you have any third-party navigation apps downloaded and updated. Do the following: Navigate to your Account tab. Tap Settings . Select a navigation app.

steps.title: Reinstall the DoorDash app.
steps.content: Reinstall the DoorDash app. If you don't see any available updates, you can uninstall DoorDash completely and reinstall it again to make sure you have a clean copy. Do the following: Open the Google Play Store. Tap your profile icon. Tap Manage apps & devices . Tap Manage . Tap DoorDash or DoorDash - Dasher . Tap Uninstall . Wait for it to uninstall. Tap Install .

steps.title: Update your device.
steps.content: Update your device. If you're running an older version of Android, you may have trouble running certain apps. To check, do the following: Open the Settings app. Tap System . Tap Software update . Tap Update .

steps.title: Check DoorDash's status.
steps.content: Check DoorDash's status. You can check DownDetector for any reported outages for DoorDash. If there's a current issue, you should see a spike of reports in the graph.

steps.title: Check your connection.
steps.content: Check your connection. For best experience, connect to a stable Wi-Fi network when using the DoorDash app. You can use your cellular data, but you may be slower depending on your signal. Make sure Airplane Mode is disabled. This will turn off both your cellular and Wi-Fi connections.

steps.title: Restart your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Restart your iPhone or iPad. This can usually fix minor software bugs. To restart your device, do the following: On iPhone : Press and hold the side button (or side button + Home button) until the screen turns black and you see the Apple logo. On iPad : Press and hold the top button (or top button + Home button) until the screen turns black and you see the Apple logo. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Check for app updates.
steps.content: Check for app updates. If you don't have automatic updates enabled, you'll need to do so manually. Do the following: Open the App Store. Search for "DoorDash"or "DoorDash dasher" and tap it. Tap Update if available.

steps.title: Log out and log in again.
steps.content: Log out and log in again. Make sure you know your account information before doing so. Tap your profile icon in the bottom-right corner. Tap Manage Account , and then Log out . Wait a few seconds, and then enter your login information again.

steps.title: Disable in-app navigation (Dashers).
steps.content: Disable in-app navigation (Dashers). If you're a dasher, there may be issues with DoorDash's navigation. You can select a different navigation app to use with DoorDash. Make sure you have any third-party navigation apps downloaded and updated. Do the following: Navigate to your Account tab. Tap Settings . Select a navigation app.

steps.title: Reinstall the DoorDash app.
steps.content: Reinstall the DoorDash app. If you don't see any available updates, you can uninstall DoorDash completely and reinstall it again to make sure you have a clean copy. Do the following: Tap and hold the DoorDash or DoorDash - Dasher app icon. Tap Delete app . Tap Delete again. Open the App Store . Search for "DoorDash" or "'DoorDash dasher". Tap the cloud icon to download it again.

steps.title: Update your device.
steps.content: Update your device. If you're running an older version of iOS, you may have trouble running certain apps. To check, do the following: Open the Settings app. Tap General . Tap Software Update . Tap Update Now .

steps.title: Check DoorDash's status.
steps.content: Check DoorDash's status. You can check DownDetector for any reported outages for DoorDash. If there's a current issue, you should see a spike of reports in the graph.
